events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund. Can someone help me with this?
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving the wrong product.
Assigning customer support agent to handle the refund request for the incorrect order fulfillment.
Hello! I understand you received the wrong item and would like a refund. I'm here to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the mistake?
Here is my order number 123456789 and attached a photo showing the incorrect product I got instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund right away and provide a prepaid label for you to return the wrong item at no cost.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund offer. I appreciate the prepaid label to return the item easily.
The refund has been processed successfully, and a return shipping label has been sent to your email. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
We are following up to ensure you received the refund and that the return process has been smooth. Please let us know if you have any more questions.
Since we have not heard back from you and the refund was completed, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us!
